chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
W: world
U: world
K: hooks
l: Equality.sort Label
st: Ordered.sort nat_ordType
s: UMC.sort (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)
s': PCM.sort (union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet))
n: nid
msg: seq nat
to: nid

Goal:
hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> l \in dom s -> s \In Coh U -> s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> not_hooked_by K l -> all_hooks_fire U l st s n msg to -> all_hooks_fire (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) l st (s \+ s') n msg to

Premises:
hooks_consistent = fun (c : context) (h : hooks) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc ls : Label) (t : nat_ordType), (z, lc, (ls, t)) \in dom h -> (lc \in dom c) && (ls \in dom c) : context -> hooks -> Prop
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
not_hooked_by = fun (K : hooks) (l : Label) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc l' : Label) (st : nat_ordType), (z, lc, (l', st)) \in dom K -> l != l' : hooks -> Label -> Prop
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type
Notation PCM T m := (PCM T m)
Notation UMC T m := (UMC T m)
Notation Unit := Unit
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Notation seq := list
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet ->
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentElim
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
union_map_classPCM : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> pcm
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
inj_hooks_complete : forall (U W : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type), valid (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> hook_complete (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K))
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
inject_step : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (s1' s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), valid (U \+ W) -> s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step W this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
coh_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (s : state), s \In Coh (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> s \In Coh U
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
hook_completeL : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type), valid (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> hook_complete U
getPUn : forall (U W : world) (l : Label), valid (U \+ W) -> l \in dom U.1 -> getProtocol U l = getProtocol (U \+ W) l
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
get_protocol_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (l : Label), valid U -> getProtocol (U \+ (Unit, K)) l = getProtocol U l
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1
getSUn : forall (s1 s2 : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)) (l : Label), valid (s1 \+ s2) -> l \in dom s1 -> getStatelet s1 l = getStatelet (s1 \+ s2) l
Actions.safe_safe : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s -> send_safe st this to (getStatelet s l) msg
Actions.send_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> forall (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1) (s2 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (r : seq nat), Actions.send_act_step S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
projectSE : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> s = projectS W1 s \+ projectS W2 s
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (getStatelet s l)
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
Actions.send_act_step : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1 -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
Actions.tryrecv_act_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> Coh W s
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r

```coq
Proof.
intros W U K l s s' n msg to.
unfold hook_complete in *.
unfold hooks_consistent in *.
rewrite <- coh_hooks in *.
apply coh_split with (W1 := U) (W2 := W) in H.
destruct H as [s1 [s2 [??]]].
rewrite <- projectS_cohR in H0.
rewrite <- projectS_cohL in H0.
split.
* intros.
apply coh_hooks with (W := W1) (K := K) in H0.
rewrite <- H0 in H.
auto.
* intros.
apply coh_hooks with (W := W2) (K := K) in H0.
rewrite <- H0 in H.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros W U K l s s' n msg to. unfold hook_complete in *. unfold hooks_consistent in *. rewrite <- coh_hooks in *. apply coh_split with (W1 := U) (W2 := W) in H. destruct H as [s1 [s2 [??]]]. rewrite <- projectS_cohR in H0. rewrite <- projectS_cohL in H0. split. * intros. apply coh_hooks with (W := W1) (K := K) in H0. rewrite <- H0 in H. auto. * intros. apply coh_hooks with (W := W2) (K := K) in H0. rewrite <- H0 in H. auto.
